datasets package¶

Submodules¶

datasets.sample_task module¶

class datasets.sample_task.SampleTaskDataset(group)¶

Bases: torch.utils.data.dataset.Dataset

The SampleTaskDataset is the sample PyTorch dataset (not Iterable Dataset) that I have created mainly for this mock project. Note that in complicated cases, batch sampling or even using the new IterableDataset class in PyTorch can make things a lot easier for us.

Module contents¶
